Damadian wagqiba ukwakhiwa kwe-MRI scanner yokuqala "yomzimba wonke", awayibiza ngokuba yi "Indomitable".

Ngelixa siphulaphule abantu besabelana ngamabali abo ngabanye, osapho, kunye nentlangano, siye safumana ukuqonda okuxabisekileyo kwixesha elidlulileyo kunye nabanye abantu ababephembelela okulungileyo okanye okubi kwinkcubeko yombutho. Ngelixa ukuqonda imbali yomntu akucingeli ukuqonda inkcubeko, oko kuyanceda abantu ukuba baqonde ukuba bawela phi kwimbali yombutho. Ngelixa kuvavanywa iimpumelelo kunye nokuqonda ukusilela, abantu kunye nabo bonke abantu abathatha inxaxheba bafumanisa nzulu ngakumbi iinqobo ezisemgangathweni, ubizo, kunye namandla okuqhuba ombutho. Kwesi sihlandlo, ukukhumbula iimeko zangaphambili zokuziphatha kwamashishini kunye nempumelelo ebangele ukuba abantu bavuleleke kutshintsho olutsha kunye nolwalathiso olutsha lwecawe yendawo. Ezi thiyori zijonga ukuba yintoni na ngabantu abathile ebenza banqwenele izinto abazenzayo kwaye zeziphi izinto ezikwindawo abahlala kuyo eziya kubenza benze okanye bangenzi izinto ezithile. flores_passage: Umzekelo, eyona ifomathi yokufota yemifanekiso eqhelekileyo kwihlabathi yi-35mm, eyayiyeyona filimu ibalaseleyo ekupheleni kwexesha lefilimu ye-analog. Isaveliswa nanamhla, kodwa okubaluleke ngakumbi umlinganiselo wayo ufunyenwe njengelifa iifomati zoluvo lwekhamera yedijithali. Ifomathi ye-35mm eneneni, ngandlel ithile iyabhida, i-36mm ububanzi ngama-24mm ubude. Umyinge we-aspect ratio yale fomati (ukwahlula ngeshumi elinesibini ukufumana owona mlinganiselo wamanani apheleleyo) ke ngoko kuthiwa ngu-3:2. Iifomathi ezininzi eziqhelekileyo (usapho lwe-APS lweefomati, umzekelo) zilingana okanye ziqikelelwa ngokusondeleyo lo mlinganiso wenkalo.

Oku kuya kuba ngumba omncinci njengoko abavelisi beelensi befikelela imigangatho ephezulu kwimveliso yelensi. Oku kuvumele iilensi zokusondeza ukuba zivelise imifanekiso yomgangatho othelekiseka naleyo izuzwe ziilensi ezinobude obugxininisiweyo obusisigxina. Enye into engalunganga yeelensi zokusondeza kukuba indawo enkulu yokuvula (isantya) yelensi idla ngokuba ngaphantsi. Oku kwenza iilensi zokusondeza ezingabizi kakhulu kube nzima ukuzisebenzisa kwiimeko zokukhanya okuphantsi ngaphandle kwesibane.

Ikholwa lifuna amava ngokuthe ngqo, intuition, okanye ukuqonda kwinyani yobuthixo / uthixo okanye ukutya. Abalandeli basukela iindlela ezithile zokuphila, okanye izenzo ezenzelwe ukukhulisa loo mava. I-Mysticism inokwahlulwa kwezinye iindlela zenkolo kunye nonqulo ngokugxininisa kumava obuqu ngqo emo eyodwa yengqondo, ngakumbi abo banoxolo, ingqiqo, ulonwabo, okanye umlinganiswa ovuyayo.

flores_passage: Xa iqela elincinane lezinto eziphilayo (inani elincinane labemi) lisahlulwa kuluntu oluphambili oluphuma kulo (njengaxa lihamba phezu kodederhu lweentaba okanye umlambo, okanye ukuba lifudukela kwisiqithi esitsha ukuze lingabi nako ngokulula. buyela umva) baya kuzifumana bekwimo engqongileyo eyahlukileyo kunaleyo bebekuyo ngaphambili. Le ndawo intsha inezixhobo ezahlukeneyo kunye nabantu okhuphisana nabo abahlukeneyo, ngoko ke abemi abatsha baya kufuna iimpawu ezahlukeneyo okanye uhlengahlengiso ukuze babe ngokhuphisana olomeleleyo kunelo bebeludinga ngaphambili. Abemi bokuqala abatshintshanga kwaphela, basafuna uhlengahlengiso olufana nolwangaphambili. Ngokuhamba kwexesha, njengoko abantu abatsha beqala ukuziqhelanisa nemeko-bume yabo entsha, baqala ukubonakala bengaphantsi nangakumbi njengabanye abantu. Ekugqibeleni, emva kwamawaka okanye izigidi zeminyaka, abantu ababini baya kubonakala bahluke kangangokuba abanakubizwa ngokuba zintlobo ezifanayo. Le nkqubo siyibiza ngokuba yi-speciation, nto leyo ethetha nje ukusekwa kohlobo olutsha. I-Speciation sisiphumo esingenakuthintelwa kwaye inxalenye ebaluleke kakhulu yendaleko.

Izazinzulu zithi iintsiba zesi silwanyana zazimdaka ngebala ngaphezulu kunye nomzantsi ophaphathekileyo okanye umbala wecarotenoid. Ihotele okanye ababuki zindwendwe bakho (ukuba uhlala kwindlu yeendwendwe okanye kwikhaya labucala) baya kuba ne-wifi okanye i-intanethi eqhagamshelweyo. I-PC, kwaye zonke iindawo zokuhlala zine-intanethi ye-intanethi okanye indawo ene-wifi yoluntu Njengoko kukhankanyiwe ngasentla, nangona igama elithi ""Eskimo" lihlala lamkelekile e-United States, lithathwa njengelihlazo ngabantu abaninzi abangengabo base-US, ngakumbi eCanada. . Ngoxa usenokuliva igama elisetyenziswa ngabemi Bomthonyama baseGreenland, ukusetyenziswa kwalo kufanele kuphetshwe ngabemi bomthonyama baseGreenland bazibiza ngokuba ngama-Inuit eKhanada naseKalaalleq (ubuninzi beKalaallit), eGreenland, uLwaphulo-mthetho Abantu basemzini ngokubanzi, abaziwa eGreenland Nkqu nasezidolophini, akukho “ndawo ezirhabaxa.” Imozulu ebandayo yeyona ngozi yokwenyani abaya kujongana nayo ukuba undwendwela iGreenland ngamaxesha abandayo uya emantla, kubanda kuya kubanda), kubalulekile ukuzisa iimpahla ezishushu ngokwaneleyo. Iintsuku ezinde kakhulu ehlotyeni zinokukhokelela kwiingxaki zokulala ngokwaneleyo kunye nemiba yezempilo ehambelana nayo. Ngexesha lasehlotyeni, zilumkele neengcongconi zaseNordic. Nangona bengadluliseli naziphi na izifo, banokucaphukisa. ”

Ukuba umkhweli uphoswa ehasheni kodwa unyawo lubanjwe kwi-stitrup, banokutsalwa ukuba ihashe liyabaleka. Ukunciphisa lo mngcipheko, inani lamanyathelo okhuseleko anokuthathwa. Okokuqala, abaninzi abakhweli banxiba iibhutsi zokukhwela ngesithende kunye neyodwa egudileyo, emxinwa kakhulu. Emva koko, ezinye iisali, ngakumbi iisali zesiNgesi, zinemivalo yokhuseleko evumela ukuba isikhumba se-stirrup siwe kwisali xa sitsalwa ngasemva ngumkhweli owawayo.

flores_passage: I-Kruger National Park (KNP) ilele kumntla-mpuma woMzantsi Afrika kwaye ihamba ecaleni komda waseMozambique ngasempuma, iZimbabwe emantla, kwaye umda osemazantsi nguMlambo iCrocodile. Le paki igubungela i-19,500 km² kwaye yahlulwe kwii-ecozones ezahlukeneyo ezili-14, nganye ixhasa izilwanyana zasendle ezahlukeneyo. Yenye yezona ndawo zinomtsalane eMzantsi Afrika kwaye ithathwa njengeyona ndawo iphambili kwiiPaki zeSizwe zaseMzantsi Afrika (i-SANParks). Njengazo zonke iiPaki zeSizwe zaseMzantsi Afrika, kukho ulondolozo lwemihla ngemihla kunye neentlawulo zokungena kule paki. Kusenokuba luncedo ukuba umntu athenge iKhadi lasendle, elibonelela ngokungena kwiindawo ezikhethiweyo zeepaki eMzantsi Afrika okanye kuzo zonke iiPaki zeSizwe zaseMzantsi Afrika.

mc_answer3: Umhambi wohlahlo lwabiwo-mali ojongene nemirhumo yepaki
mc_answer4: Umhambi uceba ukutyelela iKruger National Park kunye nenye ubuncinane ipaki

flores_passage: Iphezulu phezulu kumntla weMachu Picchu yile ntaba ingumnqantsa, ihlala ingasemva kwiifoto ezininzi zamabhodlo. Ijongeka isoyikeka kancinci ukusuka ezantsi, kwaye ngumnqantsa kwaye kunzima ukunyuka, kodwa uninzi lwabantu abafaneleke ngokufanelekileyo bafanele ukukwazi ukufikelela kwimizuzu engama-45. Izinyuko zamatye zibekwe ecaleni kwendlela, kwaye kumacandelo aphakamileyo iintambo zetsimbi zibonelela nge-handrail exhasayo. Oko kuthetha, lindela ukuba uphelelwe ngumphefumlo, kwaye unakekele kwiindawo eziphakamileyo, ngakumbi xa zimanzi, njengoko kunokuba yingozi ngokukhawuleza. Kukho umqolomba omncinci kufutshane nomphezulu ekufuneka ugqitywe kuwo, uphantsi kwaye ucudisiwe.

Oku kuquka ukulinda emgceni, njengoko izinja ezifunxa iziyobisi zinokusetyenziswa nangaliphi na ixesha ngaphandle kwesaziso. Amanye amazwe anezohlwayo eziqatha nkqu nakwamatyala okuqala; ezi zinokubandakanya izigwebo zasentolongweni ezingaphezulu kweminyaka eli-10 okanye ukufa. Iingxowa ezingajongwanga zijolise kubusela kwaye zinokutsala ingqwalasela kwabasemagunyeni abalumkelayo izoyikiso zebhombu.
question: Yintoni engakhankanywanga kwisicatshulwa malunga nokuphatha iziyobisi?

mc_answer3: Izinja ezifunxa iziyobisi zinokusetyenziswa ngaphandle kwesaziso
mc_answer4: Abasemagunyeni banokuthatha iibhegi zakho, nokuba awuziphathanga iziyobisi

flores_passage: I-Sundarbans lelona bhanti inkulu ye-littoral ye-mangrove emhlabeni, iyolula i-80 km (50 mi) ukuya kwi-Bangladeshi kunye ne-Indian hinterland ukusuka elunxwemeni. I-Sundarbans iye yabhengezwa njengeNdawo yeLifa leMveli ye-UNESCO. Inxalenye yehlathi ngaphakathi kwendawo yaseIndiya ibizwa ngokuba yiSundarbans National Park. Amahlathi ayiyo nje imigxobhozo ye-mangrove - aquka ezinye zeendawo eziseleyo zehlathi elinamandla awayekhe waligubungela ithafa laseGangetic. I-Sundarbans ithatha indawo ye-3,850 km², apho malunga nesinye kwisithathu sigqunywe emanzini / kwiindawo zomgxobhozo. Ukususela ngo-1966 i-Sundarbans ibe yindawo yokugcina izilwanyana, kwaye kuqikelelwa ukuba ngoku kukho ama-tigers ase-Royal Bengal angama-400 kunye namaxhama angama-30,000 abonakalayo kule ndawo.
question: Ngokutsho kwesicatshulwa, zeziphi ezi nkcazo zilandelayo malunga neeSundarbans ezingekho nyani?
mc_answer1: Ibonisa amanye amahlathi ambalwa amakhulu aseleyo
mc_answer2: Isiqingatha sayo yonke indawo igqunywe ngumgxobhozo
mc_answer3: Yeyona bhanti ye mangrove inkulu ehlabathini
mc_answer4: Likhaya lamaxhama anamabala amaninzi kuneenngwe zaseBengal

flores_passage: Ihlabathi lineelwimi ezingaphezu kwama-5,000 ezahlukeneyo, kuquka nezingaphezu kwamashumi amabini ezinezigidi ezingama-50 nangaphezulu. Amagama abhaliweyo kaninzi kulula ukuwaqonda kunamagama athethiweyo, nawo. Oku kuyinyaniso ngakumbi kwiidilesi, ekudla ngokuba nzima ukubiza amagama ngendlela eqondakalayo. Izizwe ezininzi ziphela zisithetha kakuhle isiNgesi, kwaye nangaphezulu unokulindela ulwazi olulinganiselweyo - ngakumbi kubantu abancinci. Khawufane ucinge, ukuba uyathanda, iMancunian, iBostonian, iJamaican kunye neSydneysider ehleli ejikeleze itafile esidla isidlo sangokuhlwa kwindawo yokutyela eToronto. Bazincokolelana ngamabali asuka kwiidolophu zabo, abaliswa ngeendlela zabo ezahlukeneyo kunye neengxabano zasekhaya.

flores_passage: Iibhasi zihamba kwisikhululo sebhasi esiphakathi kwezithili (ngaphaya komlambo) imini yonke, nangona uninzi, ngakumbi ezo zisingise empuma kunye ne-Jakar/Bumthang zihamba phakathi kwe-06:30 kunye ne-07:30. Njengoko iibhasi zezithili zemfundo zihlala zigcwele, kuyacetyiswa ukuba uthenge itikiti kwiintsuku ezimbalwa kwangaphambili. Uninzi lwezithili zikhonzwa ziibhasi ezincinci zaseJapan zeCoaster, ezikhululekile kwaye zomelele. Iiteksi ekwabelwana ngazo ziyindlela ekhawulezayo nekhululekileyo yokuhamba kwiindawo ezikufutshane, ezifana neParo (Nu 150) kunye nePunakha (Nu 200).

mc_answer2: Umhambi uya eBumthang kwaye kufuneka ahambe ngo-7
mc_answer3: Umhambi uya eParo kwaye kufuneka ahambe emva kwe-11
mc_answer4: Umhambi ubheka empuma kwaye ufika esitishini ngaphambi kwe-6:20

flores_passage: "Idityaniswe nokungafikeleleki kwayo, "iTimbuktu" sele isetyenziswe njengesikweko semihlaba engaqhelekanga, ekude. Namhlanje, iTimbuktu yidolophu ehlwempuzekileyo, nangona idumela layo liyenza ibe ngumtsalane wabakhenkethi, kwaye inesikhululo seenqwelomoya. Ngo-1990, yongezwa kuluhlu lweendawo zelifa lehlabathi ezisengozini, ngenxa yesoyikiso sentlabathi yasentlango Yaba yenye yeendawo zokumisa ezinkulu ngexesha likaHenry Louis Gates iPBS ekhethekileyo yeHlabathi laseAfrika kwezinye izixeko zelizwe, kuba inobuchule obungakumbi besiArabhu kunomAfrika.”

flores_passage: I-Paralympics iya kuqhutywa ukusuka kwi-24 Agasti ukuya kwi-5 Septemba 2021. Eminye iminyhadala iya kubanjelwa kwezinye iindawo kulo lonke elaseJapan. I-Tokyo iya kuba sesona sixeko sase-Asia kuphela esibambe iiOlimpiki ezimbini zasehlotyeni, emva kokuba isingathe imidlalo ngo-1964. Imigaqo-nkqubo yokurhoxiswa iyahluka, kodwa ukusukela ngasekupheleni kuka-Matshi uninzi lwemigaqo-nkqubo yokurhoxiswa esekwe kwi-coronavirus ayinwebeki ukuya kuJulayi ka-2020, xa iiOlimpiki zazicwangcisiwe. Kulindeleke ukuba amatikiti omnyhadala amaninzi axabisa phakathi kwe ¥2,500 kunye ne ¥130,000, namatikiti aqhelekileyo axabisa malunga ne ¥7,000.

flores_passage: Ukuba ilizwe oza kulindwendwela liphantsi kwengcebiso yohambo, i-inshurensi yakho yezempilo yohambo okanye i-inshurensi yokurhoxiswa kohambo inokuchaphazeleka. Usenokunqwenela ukubonisana nengcebiso yoorhulumente ngaphandle kweyakho, kodwa iingcebiso zabo zenzelwe abemi babo. Njengomzekelo omnye, abemi baseMelika kuMbindi Mpuma banokujongana neemeko ezahlukeneyo kubantu baseYurophu okanye kuma-Arabhu. Amacebiso asisishwankathelo nje esifutshane semeko yezopolitiko kwilizwe elinye. Iimbono ezinikezelweyo zihlala ziqhelekile, ziqhelekile kwaye zenziwe lula kakhulu xa kuthelekiswa neenkcukacha ezithe vetshe ezifumaneka kwenye indawo.

flores_passage: Ii-arhente zokuhamba zikho ukususela ngenkulungwane ye-19. I-arhente yohambo idla ngokuba lukhetho olulungileyo kuhambo oludlulela ngaphaya kwamava angaphambili omhambi ngendalo, inkcubeko, ulwimi okanye amazwe anengeniso ephantsi. Nangona uninzi lweearhente zikulungele ukuthatha uninzi lokubhukisha rhoqo, iiarhente ezininzi zisebenza ngokukhethekileyo kwiintlobo zokuhamba, uluhlu lohlahlo lwabiwo-mali okanye iindawo zokuya. Kungangcono ukusebenzisa iarhente ehlala ibhala iihambo ezifanayo nezakho. Jonga ukuba zeziphi iihambo ezikhuthazwa yiarhente, nokuba kukwiwebhusayithi okanye kwifestile yevenkile.

flores_passage: UMboniso weHlabathi (odla ngokubizwa ngokuba yi-World Exposition, okanye ngokulula nje uMboniso) ngumnyhadala wehlabathi jikelele wezobugcisa nezenzululwazi. Amazwe athatha inxaxheba enza imiboniso yobugcisa nemfundo kwiipaviliyoni zesizwe ukubonisa imiba yehlabathi okanye inkcubeko nembali yelizwe labo. Imiboniso yeHorticultural yeHlabathi yimisitho eyodwa ebonisa imiboniso yeentyatyambo, izitiya zebhotani kunye nayo nayiphi na enye into enokwenza nezityalo. Nangona kwithiyori zinokuthi zenzeke ngonyaka (ngokude nje zikumazwe ahlukeneyo), ekusebenzeni azikho. Ezi ziganeko zikholisa ukuhlala naphi na phakathi kweenyanga ezintathu nezintandathu, kwaye zibanjelwa kwiindawo ezingekho ngaphantsi kweehektare ezingama-50.
